message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'd really appreciate. I'm offering it to you for $120.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $90?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  While I value the product highly, I understand your budget constraints.  Would you consider meeting halfway at $105?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to propose a price of $95 for the product. This allows me to stay within my budget while still showing appreciation for the value of the item.
